title: Augusta County: C. T. Wills to John H. McCue, November 20, 1852
summary: C. T. Wills' letter to McCue makes reference to several insurance policies, including a refusal to issue policies involving Irishmen in Staunton. Wills also provides McCue with the names of other companies whose bylaws serve as the basis for the bylaws of the Lynchburg Hose and Fire Company.
keywords: Economy, Home Front, Race Relations, American Civil War
